Wizard Fire MP Mod Digits
09 = Rock ?
0D = Water
1D = Circle
1E = Thunder
20 = head
26 = Circle
12 = Question Mark
15 = Fire
19 = WInd

P1 Weapon Modifier [Thomas83Lin]
2868B578 00000006
2068B57C 00080000
48000000 80891308
DE000000 80008180
10060CB8 0000000x
E0000000 80008000
x=0=?
0=Machine Gun
1=Laser
2=Spread
3=Fire
